values: Sen. Ron Johnson: What’s Really in the “Big Beautiful Bill,” and Uncovering the Truth About 9-11

Here’s what happened when Sen. Ron Johnson started to ask forbidden questions about 9-11, the COVID vax and America’s looming bankruptcy.



(00:00) Introduction

(01:19) How Financially Ignorant Is Congress?

(16:34) Are We in a Debt Crisis?

(30:29) What Would Happen if We Fall Into a Massive Debt Crisis?

(35:09) The Truth About the “Big Beautiful Bill”
